ygData.subject: Re: Guilds (was Twinking...)
ygData.msgSnippet: I must agree here with Barrd, get out of that guild, Faras!  Surely there are others that can provide what you are looking for.  I was very very hesitant about
ygData.messageBody:
I must agree here with Barrd, get out of that guild, Faras! Surely there
are others that can provide what you are looking for. I was very very
hesitant about joining a guild (Karana server) because I saw some bad
examples of how some guilds treat even their own members. But, I had a dear
friend who gently encouraged me to join one, and never gave up on me, and I
finally joined, and couldn't be happier! Kinship Of Valor is so very much
like a family, its amazing. Giving and concern and comraderie are the
norm. And if anyone is ever in need, help is always on the way! I love it!

Elwe, 30 songs
Bard of the Kinship of Valor
Karana Server
